cbinstall.description: Component plugin allowing users to post Blogs using CMS content system.

param.name: tab_count
param.label: Count
param.description: Enable or disable display of blog count in tab title.

param.name: tab_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging on tab blogs.

param.name: tab_limit
param.label: Page Limit
param.description: Input page limit on tab blogs. Page limit determines how many blogs are displayed per page.

param.name: tab_search
param.label: Search
param.description: Enable or disable usage of search on tab blogs.

param.name: tab_orderby
param.label: Order By
param.description: Select how to order the tab blogs.

param.name: general_template
param.label: Template
param.description: Select template to be used for all of CB Blogs. If template is incomplete then missing files will be used from the default template. Template files can be located at the following location: components/com_comprofiler/plugin/user/plug_cbblogs/templates/.

param.name: general_class
param.label: Class
param.description: Optionally add a class suffix to surrounding DIV encasing all of CB Blogs.

param.name: blog_model
param.label: Model
param.description: Select blog model usage. Model determines where blogs will be displayed from. Select a specific model to enable model specific parameters.

param.name: blog_mode
param.label: Mode
param.description: Select blog mode usage. Mode determines how blogs are stored and displayed.

param.name: blog_categories
param.label: Categories
param.description: Input comma separated list of internal categories (e.g. General,Movies,Family).

param.name: blog_j_section
param.label: Category
param.description: Select the external CMS content category where blogs will be stored as well as blog categories used.

param.name: blog_k2_section
param.label: Category
param.description: Select the K2 content category where blogs will be stored as well as blog categories used.

param.name: blog_create_access
param.label: Create Access
param.description: Select blog create access. Access determines who can create blogs. The group selected as well as those above it will have access (e.g. Registered will also be accessible to Author). Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: blog_limit
param.label: Create Limit
param.description: Input number of blogs each individual user is limited to creating. If blank allow unlimited blogs. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: blog_approval
param.label: Approval
param.description: Enable or disable approval of blogs. Approval requires a moderator to publish a blog before it is made visible. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: blog_captcha
param.label: Captcha
param.description: Enable or disable usage of captcha on blogs. Requires latest CB AntiSpam to be installed and published. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: blog_delete
param.label: Auto Delete
param.description: Enable or disable automatic deletion of blogs when a user is deleted.

param.name: approval_notify
param.label: Notify
param.description: Enable or disable moderator notifications for blogs needing approval.

param.name: blog_published_default
param.label: Published
param.description: Select default value for the published parameter.

param.name: blog_published_config
param.label: Published Display
param.description: Enable or disable the display of the published parameter. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: blog_int_category_default
param.label: Category
param.description: Select default value for the category parameter.

param.name: blog_j_category_default
param.label: Category
param.description: Select default value for the category parameter.

param.name: blog_k2_category_default
param.label: Category
param.description: Select default value for the category parameter.

param.name: blog_category_config
param.label: Category Display
param.description: Enable or disable the display of the category parameter. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: blog_access_default
param.label: Access
param.description: Select default value for the access parameter.

param.name: blog_access_config
param.label: Access Display
param.description: Enable or disable the display of the access parameter. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.
